description.en:
Electric Treadmill THUNDER RACE-BLACK 
Manufacturer code: RACE-BLACK
Power: 1500W
Speed: 0.8 km/h – 14 km/h
Maximum user weight: 130 kg
Belt length: 105 cm
Belt width: 40.5 cm
Machine weight: 33.5 kg
Power supply: 220-240V, 50-60Hz
Massager: without massager
Incline adjustment: without incline adjustment
Device class: CH
